Articles.Content:
So, what\'s the plan for this with .16 out? I\'m happy to fly my last flight on this one; I copied over my .15.2 install before patching to .16. Nutt007, I\'m not going to jump in front of you if you want to fly yours as well; just let me know.

Now, who want to organize Stock Base 4.0? (Not it!)

> 
> Now, who want to organize Stock Base 4.0? (Not it!)

I have now posted the SCB for 0.16, all may now fight to the death  organise and carry on with this as they please in a civilised manner ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16839.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16839.0)
sign me up for my north pole base...
